p: Finally, polysaccharides isolated from SCE fruits have been intensively studied. SCE is the source of homogeneous polysaccharides composed mainly of glucose, galactose, mannose, and rhamnose in various molar proportions. Their mass ranged from 18 to 127 kDa [ 35, 36, 37, 38]. Polysaccharides also occur in combination with uronic acid and proteins [ 39, 40, 41].
